column2: "So uh, the other day, there was some person upgrading their items, meow."
"Everyone looks really excited and has a lot of fun upgrading items, right! I want to try it, too, meow!"
"But I don't have a grinder, so I was told to please come again by the person at the Item Lab, meow..."
"So, please help me, meow. I want you to bring me a grinder!"
